mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "create_by", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "create_date", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sku AS "sku", a.name AS "name", a.chengben AS "chengben", a.maoli20 AS "maoli20", a.advise_price AS "advise_price", a.nitiaojia AS "nitiaojia"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_product_amazon a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.sku LIKE '%'||#{sku}||'%' '%'+#{sku}+'%' concat('%',#{sku},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_product_amazon( id, create_by, update_by, update_date, create_date, remarks, del_flag, sku, name, chengben, maoli20, advise_price, nitiaojia ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{create_by}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{create_date}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sku}, #{name}, #{chengben}, #{maoli20}, #{advise_price}, #{nitiaojia} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_product_amazon SET remarks = #{remarks}, sku = #{sku}, name = #{name}, chengben = #{chengben}, maoli20 = #{maoli20}, advise_price = #{advise_price}, nitiaojia = #{nitiaojia} WHERE id = #{id}
